# Copilot Instructions for OneShotMovieWorkDesk

## About this document

This is a guide to help GitHub Copilot and various AI tools understand the context of this repository.

When implementing new features, please use the technology selection, design principles, and module configuration presented here as a guide.

If you are unsure about anything, explore the repository's files and ask the user, "Is this what you meant?"

## Prerequisites

- When making code changes that are likely to exceed 100 lines, please confirm with the user in advance, "This instruction may result in changes exceeding 100 lines. Do you want to execute it?"
- When making major changes, first plan what you will do and then propose to the user, "I think we'll proceed with this plan." If the user requests revisions to the plan, revise the plan and resubmit it.

## App Overview

OneShotMovieWorkDesk is a [Processing](https://processing.org/)-based application for creating movie.

### Technology Stack

- Language: Processing 4.4.6 or later
- Video creation: [FFmpeg](https://www.ffmpeg.org/) for movie file generation
